content:
path /dns/v1/stacks/stackid/zones/zoneid/parse
operationId ParseRecordsFromZoneFile
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name zoneid
description A DNS zone ID
in path
required True
schema
type string
summary Parse a zone file
description Parse a BIND zone file into StackPath DNS resource records

This returns a list of records but does not import them into the zone SOA and NS records in the zone file are ignored
requestBody
zoneParseRecordsFromZoneFileRequest
type object
zoneFile
type string
format byte
description Base64 encoded BIND zone file contents
required True
responses
200
zoneParseRecordsFromZoneFileResponse
type object
records
type array
zoneImportZoneRecord
type object
properties
name
type string
description A zone records name
zoneRecordType
type string
default EMPTY
description The resource record types supported by StackPath

 EMPTY The resource record has no type
  A The resource record translates a host to an IPv4 address
  AAAA The resource record translates a host to an IPv6 address
  CNAME The resource record aliases one name to another
  TXT The resource record contains a descriptive string Many applications use TXT records for configuration
  MX The resource record defines a mail exchanger for the given host
  SRV The resource record defines a service on the domain
  NS The resource record describes a nameserver that serves its domains zone and records
  CAA The resource record describes a certification authority authorization that adds validation to which certificate authorities can issue certificates for a domain
ttl
type integer
format int32
description A zone records time to live

A records TTL is the number of seconds that the record should be cached by DNS resolvers Use lower TTL values if you expect zone records to change often Use higher TTL values for records that wont change to prevent extra DNS lookups by clients
data
type string
description A zone records value

MX record data follows the format   without s
weight
type integer
format int32
description A zone records priority

A resource record is replicated in StackPaths DNS infrastructure the number of times of the records weight giving it a more likely response to queries if a zone has records with the same name and type
description A DNS zone resource record as imported from a 3rd party provider
description The resource records StackPath was able to import from a zone file
description A response from a request to parse records from a zone file
